Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory595.jpg'}

{3: 'Self-modification is destined to be a painful path. To change humanity itself means that all the social structures, ethics and morals built upon the biological foundation of humans will be reshuffled.'}
{3: 'It will take a long time for humanity to ease the pains that emerge from the transition between old and new orders.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Godwin', 3: "I'm so disappointed in you...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Godwin stares at a newly-joined research assistant in a temporary prison modified from an underground warehouse. He sounds incredibly calm.'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'Why did you attempt to leak the information? Did the Science Council send you here? Or was it Kowloong? Akdilek? How much did they offer you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Research Assistant', 3: "Nobody sent us here or made any offer. It's just that... We couldn't take it any longer.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Research Assistant', 3: "Professor, let's stop. Those experiments should not continue.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'I told you on the first day you arrived. Unlike other projects, we were trying to embrace a new evolution.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: "Don't let the shackles of the old time hold you back.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Research Assistant', 3: 'You threw those people directly into the experiments...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'Biologically, they were no different from the clone test subjects obtained through Project Cthylla.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'But we were unable to get any more variety in the cloned samples. A technology that can only be applied to selected individuals is useless.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The assistant remains silent. Godwin lets out a sigh.'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'The curiosity of humans has already begun to compromise with their physical conditions.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: "Back in Newton's time, a human could master all the available scientific knowledge with sufficient perseverance and talent.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: "These days, just learning the basics of a minor field of science would consume a person's entire life.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: "How much innovation can they make after wasting away their mind's golden time?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: "It's highly likely in the future that a person can't even finish learning a sub-field throughout their life.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'By that time, it will be too late for mankind to change.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'No need to lament for these people of the old days. Their greatest contribution to the new era will be to become its foundation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Research Assistant', 3: 'But sir, aren\'t we also from the "old days"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'No. We are the trailblazers.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'Pioneering in a new era always comes with blood and sacrifice. You either become a trailblazer, or end up a stepping stone.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: "That's a duty that nobody can escape.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'I hope you can understand. You are my best student.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Research Assistant', 3: "If that's the case, who will be able to tell us what we doing is right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'Only those who have reached the end deserve a second chance, to talk about right or wrong.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Research Assistant', 3: 'But they will never have a second chance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Research Assistant', 3: 'Professor, there is no future in your eyes. I only see a devil.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory693.jpg'}
{3: 'As Lucia and Alpha go deeper into the institute, they see bullet marks, dented and shattered screens, as well as overturned desks and chairs everywhere...'}
{3: 'All of them are revealing the intensity of the conflict that took place earlier. However...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why are there no bodies?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'If there is any blood stain left, they could have at least traced it. But all the evidence seems to have been cleaned away by the diligent cleaning robots.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: "The cleaning robots wouldn't be able to carry the bodies. Someone else might be here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha recalls the voice that told her about the shuttle.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: '(Could it be her?)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha has never ruled out the possibility that this is a trap. She suddenly sees someone out of the corner of her eye.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Her dagger cuts through the air, creating a small whirlwind that sends all the paper flying.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A black humanoid was impaled on the wall. The paper slowly falls to the ground, revealing its real look.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's a test subject from the cultivation tank!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Well, this must be their assembled product. What a horrible taste.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'We will probably see a lot of enemies like this in the next area.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Even if they can still move, they are but mindless counterfeits that are neither Constructs nor humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Spare no mercy. Don't be fooled by that brain on them.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You don't need to remind me.", 4: '1'}
